articles.description: West Indies (WI) vs India (IND), 3rd ODI Highlights: India beat West Indies by 200 runs at the Brian Lara Stadium in Tarouba, Trinidad to win the series 2-1. Shardul Thakur picked up four wickets.
articles.content: Hello and welcome to our live coverage of the 3rd and final ODI between West Indies and India from the Brian Lara Cricket Stadium in Trinidad.
